projects.name: Pokesearch
projects.description: Pokemon data search: Enter the pokemon's name and see the complete pokemon data, such as its abilities, stats, shiny forms and more. Powered by PokeAPI.

projects.name: The Recipe Finder
projects.description: The Recipe Finder is a comprehensive recipe search engine that allows you to find recipes by name, ingredients, diet type, and nutrients. Whether you're looking for a vegan lasagna, a gluten-free cake, or a high-protein breakfast, The Recipe Finder has you covered.
